metadata.name: Left-click and Save As guy
metadata.created_by: found myself in a square pixel & G9ralt
metadata.description:
This 1/1 is part of an art performance by found myself in a square pixel and G9ralt released on February 1st, 2023.  
An open edition of the Left-click and Save As guy was launched simultaneously for 24h along with an auction for this piece.

The open edition can be found at contract 0xc4a27a38972a56db6d719a4526d6e16eb13ccc64/26

The Left-click and Save As guy is a decentralization maxi who's keen to seize the memes of production. Heâ€™s BUIDLing ahead to spread the memes for an open metaverse as far as possible.  
Left-click Save as, a symbol for building an open metaverse, spreading our memes and our message for the freedom to transact!

This Open Edition took part in an NFT art performance by G9ralt and found myself in a square pixel

This piece is in the public domain. Feel free to use it as you want.

Seize the Memes of Production!
